remarks: Converse of a trace-preserving endomorphism value.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2014.)
statement:
tendosp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendosp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendosp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendocnv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E /\ F e. T ) -> `' ( S ` F ) = ( S ` `' F ) ) $.
